titles.title: To reliquidate certain entries of gemifloxacin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection to: (1) reliquidate certain entries of gemifloxacin into the United States; and (2) refund any duty paid (including interest) on such entries.
